HOW IT WORKS

HOW TO INSTALL THE TRUE COLOUR MATCH EXTENSION

1. ADD THE EXTENSION: Click the "Add to Chrome" button and confirm by selecting "Add Extension."

2. PIN FOR EASY ACCESS: After installing, pin the extension for quick use. Just click the puzzle icon (top-right of your browser), then click the pin next to the True Colour Match logo.

3. GET STARTED: Create your account, enjoy a 3-day free trial, and start swatching colors instantly!
